{"id":1150517718,"question_id":50,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1705651180,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1150517718/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        \n        if(n==0) return 1;\n        \n        \n        boolean sign=false;\n        if(n<0){\n            n=-n;\n            sign=true;\n        }\n        \n        if(n%2==0){\n            \n            if(sign)\n                return 1/myPow(x*x, n/2);\n            else\n                return myPow(x*x, n/2);\n        }else {\n            \n            if(sign)\n                return 1/x*myPow(x*x, n/2);\n            else\n                return  x*myPow(x*x, n/2);\n        }\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
